name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: [SOUND] This

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: lecture is about the contextual text mining.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: Contextual text mining is related to multiple

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _kinds of knowledge that we mine from text data

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _It's related to topic mining because you can make topics associated with context

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: like time or location.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _And similarly
column6: we can make opinion mining more contextualized

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: making opinions connected to context.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: It's related to text based prediction because it allows us to combine non-text

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: data with text data to derive sophisticated predictors for

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: the prediction problem.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _So more specifically
column6: why are we interested in contextual text mining? _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Well
column6: that's first because text often has rich context information. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _And this can include direct context such as meta-data

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _So
column6: the direct context can grow the meta-data such as time

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _location
column7: and source of the text data. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: And they're almost always available to us.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: Indirect context refers to additional data related to the meta-data.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _So for example

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _context such as social network of the author

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Such information is not in general directly related to the text

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _through the process

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _There could be other text data from the same source

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: as this one through the other text can be connected with this text as well.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _So in general
column6: any related data can be regarded as context. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: So there could be removed or rated for context.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: And so what's the use?

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: What is text context used for?

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Well
column6: context can be used to partition text data in many interesting ways. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: It can almost allow us to partition text data in other ways as we need.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: And this is very important because this allows

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: us to do interesting comparative analyses.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _It also in general
column6: provides meaning to the discovered topics

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: if we associate the text with context.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: So here's illustration of how context

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: can be regarded as interesting ways of partitioning of text data.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: So here I just showed some research papers published in different years.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _On different venues

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _different conference names here listed on the bottom like the SIGIR or ACL

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: Now such text data can be partitioned

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: in many interesting ways because we have context.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: So the context here just includes time and the conference venues.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: But perhaps we can include some other variables as well.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: But let's see how we can partition this interesting of ways.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _First
column6: we can treat each paper as a separate unit. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _So in this case
column7: each paper has its own context. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: It's independent.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: But we can also treat all the papers within 1998 as one group and

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: this is only possible because of the availability of time.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: And we can partition data in this way.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _This would allow us to compare topics for example

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Similarly
column6: we can partition the data based on the menus. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: We can get all the SIGIR papers and compare those papers with the rest.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Or compare SIGIR papers with KDD papers

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _We can also partition the data to obtain the papers written by authors in the U.S.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _and that of course
column6: uses additional context of the authors. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: And this would allow us to then compare such a subset with

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: another set of papers written by also seen in other countries.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Or we can obtain a set of papers about text mining

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: this can be compared with papers about another topic.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: And note that these partitionings can be also

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: intersected with each other to generate even more complicated partitions.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _And so in general
column6: this enables discovery of knowledge associated with _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: different context as needed.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _And in particular

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: And this often gives us a lot of useful knowledge.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _For example
column7: we can see trends of topics. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: Comparing topics in different contexts can also reveal differences

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: about the two contexts.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: So there are many interesting questions that require contextual text mining.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: Here I list some very specific ones.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _For example
column6: what topics have been getting increasing attention _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: recently in data mining research?

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Now to answer this question

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: obviously we need to analyze text in the context of time.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: So time is context in this case.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: Is there any difference in the responses of people in different regions

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _to the event

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: So this is a very broad an answer to this question.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _In this case of course

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: What are the common research interests of two researchers?

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _In this case

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: Is there any difference in the research topics published by authors in the USA and

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: those outside?

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Now in this case
column6: the context would include the authors and _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: their affiliation and location.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: So this goes beyond just the author himself or herself.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: We need to look at the additional information connected to the author.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: Is there any difference in the opinions of all the topics expressed on

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: one social network and another?

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _In this case
column6: the social network of authors and the topic can be a context. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: Other topics in news data that are correlated with sudden changes in

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: stock prices.

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _In this case
column6: we can use a time series such as stock prices as context. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _What issues mattered in the 2012 presidential campaign

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: presidential election?

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Now in this case

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _So
column7: the list can go on and on. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: _Basically
column6: contextual text mining can have many applications. _

name: 5 - 7 - 4.7 Contextual Text Mining- Motivation (00-06-47).srt
text: [MUSIC]
